ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] 21st lvl
ygData.msgSnippet: Try crag spiders in East Karana.  If you buff your pet with Quickness just before the fight (along with your other buffs) and lead off with enthrall, tashani,
ygData.messageBody:
Try crag spiders in East Karana. If you buff your pet with Quickness just
before the fight (along with your other buffs) and lead off with enthrall,
tashani, languid pace, choke they are pretty easy. Try to keep it on your
pet so you don't get poisoned and if you have the money use rune to help
your pet. Worked for me :)

Also, this technique works on the Ogre Raiders on the island in Timorous
Deep that you get to by taking the barrel barge from Oasis. There you don't
have to worry about poison, too. Just go between the one at the dock and
the one standing on the rocks. Be careful though, as this hurts faction
with The Overthere.

Tinik Gutenungrie
24 Gnomish Enchanter, Veeshan


-----Original Message-----
From: koosh@... [mailto:koosh@...]
Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 11:02 PM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] 21st lvl


I've noted that a few others out there said they got stuck at 16 and
21st lvl.

I am a High Elf enchanter and i'm stuck at 1bub into 21st lvl. I
have tried the kunark zones but can't seem to find a group. I have
tried to solo but my skill at it sucks.

Please help me.
I need to know where I should be hunting. I just took the long run
to Qeynos and that is so I can hunt in SK where everyone has
told me I should kill Treants or Avaiks. (I don't really want to kill
treants, as I like being able to port to Druid rings)

Thanks in advance.
